name: QB4OLAP
tagline: A RDF vocabulary to publish and operate with multidimensional data on the web.
body:
### Introduction
*QB4OLAP* vocabulary is an extension to the [http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-data-cube/ DataCube vocabulary] that allows to represent OLAP cubes in RDF, and to implement OLAP operators (such as Roll-up, Slice, and Dice) as SPARQL queries directly on this RDF representation.

You can find the current version of the vocabulary in Turtle format here.


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
